content: * this is a pattern of little bull symbol of the new 2021 year * if you ll crochet this toy with thin acrylic yarn alize forewer as i did high will be only 3 5 inches so you can use it like a toy for christmas tree or a keychain or just like cutest new year present for someone you care about * you need yarn of three colors hook 1 5 needle for sewing two beads or safety eyes stuffing and couple hours of your free time * also you can choose any yarn that you like and hook additional to the yarn than size will be different this is my first pattern so please feel free to contact me if something is missing or not clear i will appreciate every comment and will use it to make better patterns in future
